properties.travelerInformationMessage:
Between US 24 and Galley Road (Colorado Springs) from Mile Point 141.74 to Mile Point 142.2. Right lane closed due to traffic sign installation. Starting September 15, 2022 at 7:00PM MDT until September 16, 2022 at about 7:00AM MDT.
Between Galley Road and US 24 (Colorado Springs) from Mile Point 142.2 to Mile Point 141.74. Right lane closed due to traffic sign installation. Starting September 15, 2022 at 7:00PM MDT until September 16, 2022 at about 7:00AM MDT.
